last_episode_to_air.name: Maxing Defense and the Big Final Battle
last_episode_to_air.overview: The third and final day of the eighth event brings the strongest monsters yet. Maple Tree, Flame Emperors, and Order of the Holy Sword work together to fight off the final onslaught. The goal is to make it to the end of the event alive...

name: BOFURI: I Don't Want to Get Hurt, so I'll Max Out My Defense.
original_name: 痛いのは嫌なので防御力に極振りしたいと思います。
overview: Kaede Honjou is invited by her friend Risa Shiramine to play a virtual reality MMO game with her. While Kaede doesn't dislike games, what she really, truly dislikes is being in pain. She creates a character named Maple, and decides to put all her points in VIT to minimize pain. As a result, she moves slowly, can't use magic, and even a rabbit can get the best of her. But as it turns out, she acquires a skill known as "Absolute Defense" as a result of her pumping points into VIT, as well as a "Counter Skill" that works against special moves. Now, with her ability to nullify all damage, she goes on adventures.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
After an enthusiastic invitation from her friend, Kaede Honjou reluctantly agrees to try New World Online: a very popular VRMMO played by thousands of people across Japan. Naming her in-game character Maple, she sets out on her journey. As a complete novice to such games, she allocates all of her stat points into vitality, desiring to not get hurt. With not a single point in any other stat, Maple has extraordinarily high defense, but she can't move quickly or hit hard.

This doesn't end badly for her, however. Due to her high defense, Maple acquires overpowered skills. After only a few days of playing the game, Maple claims third place in a server-wide event, gaining a reputation as a player. Despite her overpowered character, Kaede has much to learn. As she progresses through the game, she meets new friends. Through all of her adventures, she may even pick up some other crazy skills that exceed all expectations.

episodes.name: Defense and First Battle
episodes.overview: Convinced by her friend Risa to try "NewWorld Online", Kaede begins her VRMMO adventure by going all-in on defense because she doesn't want to get hurt.

episodes.name: Defense and Friends
episodes.overview: Maple enters a battle royal and is hunted down by a horde of players. Risa uses her swimming talent to explore an underwater cave with her character Sally.

episodes.name: Defense and Reaching Second Level
episodes.overview: After Maple gets nerfed, her and Sally do some exploring before challenging the dungeon that leads to the second level. Can they clear it in time for the second event?

episodes.name: Defense and Second Event
episodes.overview: Though Maple and Sally get off to a clumsy start in the second event, their tenacity and teamwork is rewarded in more ways than one.

episodes.name: Defense and Spoils of War
episodes.overview: Maple and Sally make new friends and fall into more trouble as the second event winds down. But to reach their goal of 20 medals, they may have to resort to PvP.

episodes.name: Defense and Reinforcements
episodes.overview: Maple leaps at the chance to create a guild and searches for a place to call home. But to compete in the upcoming event, they'll need to recruit more help.

episodes.name: Defense and Upgrades
episodes.overview: Everyone in the guild is hard at work leveling up and preparing for what's to come. Maple manages to "cheese" her way through a quest to help a sick NPC.

episodes.name: Defense and Third Event
episodes.overview: The third event is packed with people making it hard to compete for cowbells. Following the event, Maple gets into gear to explore new content on the third level.

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member 2 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Mitsuki Nakamura

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member 1 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Takahiro Shibano

episodes.name: Defense and Fourth Event
episodes.overview: Guilds prepare for all-out war as the big competition finally begins. But sneaky Sally has some tricks up her sleeve that hopefully gives them the upper hand.

episodes.name: Defense and Attack
episodes.overview: Sally faces certain death and there's trouble back at the base. Despite having a good start, if the guild hopes to place top ten, Maple Tree must go on the attack.

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member 1 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Seiyu Fujiwara

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member 3 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Jun Inoue

guest_stars.character: Order of the Holy Sword Guild Member (voice)
guest_stars.name: Kazuki Souya

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member 2 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Tadaaki Doi

episodes.name: Defense and Mighty Foe
episodes.overview: Maple Tree is vastly outnumbered and struggles to stay on the board. As guilds get wiped out left and right, they must face a mighty foe that may be their undoing.

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member 1 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Mitsuki Nakamura

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member 2 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Jun Inoue

episodes.name: Defense and Bonds
episodes.overview: Maple may have maxed out her defense, but can she protect her friends and base from a legendary player? This time, Maple may have met her match.

guest_stars.character: Order of the Holy Sword Guild Member (voice)
guest_stars.name: Jun Inoue

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member 1 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Takahiro Shibano

guest_stars.name: Tadaaki Doi

1.name: Season 1
1.overview:
After an enthusiastic invitation from her friend, Kaede Honjou reluctantly agrees to try New World Online: a very popular VRMMO played by thousands of people across Japan. Naming her in-game character Maple, she sets out on her journey. As a complete novice to such games, she allocates all of her stat points into vitality, desiring to not get hurt. With not a single point in any other stat, Maple has extraordinarily high defense, but she can't move quickly or hit hard.

This doesn't end badly for her, however. Due to her high defense, Maple acquires overpowered skills. After only a few days of playing the game, Maple claims third place in a server-wide event, gaining a reputation as a player. Despite her overpowered character, Kaede has much to learn. As she progresses through the game, she meets new friends. Through all of her adventures, she may even pick up some other crazy skills that exceed all expectations.

episodes.name: Maxing Defense and Christmas
episodes.overview: As Christmas draws near, New World Online finally releases Level 4 concurrently with a special holiday event in which rare and exclusive items are at stake.

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member (voice)
guest_stars.name: Jun Inoue

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member (voice)
guest_stars.name: Farahnaz Nikray

episodes.name: Maxing Defense, Level 5, and Level 6
episodes.overview: Maple's guildmates must explore Level 5 without her while she recovers from a cold. Right after Maple finally gets a chance to see Level 5, the gang finds out that Level 6 is already on the way, but this time it's Sally who can't seem to go in...

episodes.name: Maxing Defense and the Seventh Event
episodes.overview: New World Online's seventh event begins, and it's a battle tower event with multiple difficulty levels. Maple and Sally team up to take on the highest difficulty level, giving the game's admins more than they bargained for...

episodes.name: Maxing Defense and Tower Conquest
episodes.overview: Maple and Sally continue to work their way up the ten floors of the tower as they attempt to complete the event before anyone else.

episodes.name: Maxing Defense and Tentacles
episodes.overview: Level 7 has been released, and it introduces a new feature: players can now tame monsters. The members of Maple Tree explore the new level in search of their ideal companions.

episodes.name: Maxing Defense and Tame Monsters
episodes.overview: The members of Maple Tree continue their searches for monster companions. Iz's search leads her on a quest to find rare materials in challenging areas, so she asks Maple and Mii for help.

episodes.name: Maxing Defense and Hunting for Crystals
episodes.overview: With the eighth event about to start, Maple and Sally decide to leisurely explore Level 7. Their plans quickly change when they stumble upon a strange crystal...

episodes.name: Maxing Defense and the Eighth Event
episodes.overview: The preliminary round of the eighth event finally begins. The members of Maple Tree fight their hardest, making the most of their new monster companions, in hopes of ranking high for the main event.

episodes.name: Maxing Defense and Setting Up a Base
episodes.overview: The main portion of the eighth event begins. The members of Maple Tree work as two teams to try to acquire medals, then come back together to set up a base for protection against the stronger monsters that come out at night.

episodes.name: Maxing Defense and New Teams
episodes.overview: The second day of the eighth event begins with forced teleports that send players in all directions, a dark void that swallows up some parties' bases, and the disabling of maps. On top of all this, those who survived the first night are left to fight either alone or with members of rival guilds.

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member (voice)
guest_stars.name: Chitose Morinaga

episodes.name: Maxing Defense and New Parties
episodes.overview: Maple Tree, Order of the Holy Sword, and Flame Emperors have all come together in Maple Tree's base. Assorted members from all three guilds form parties to head out and fight monsters so they can earn more medals during the second night of the event.

guest_stars.character: Kingdom of the Flame Emperors Guild Member (voice)
guest_stars.name: Chitose Morinaga

guest_stars.character: Order of the Holy Sword Guild Member (voice)
guest_stars.name: Tadaaki Doi
